verses.verse: And he showed <WH7200> me <WH853> Joshua <WH3091> the high <WH1419> priest <WH3548> standing <WH5975> before <WH6440> the angel <WH4397> of the LORD, <WH3068> and Satan <WH7854> standing <WH5975> at <WH5921> his right hand <WH3225> to resist <WH7853> him.

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Satan, <WH7854> The LORD <WH3068> rebuke <WH1605> thee, O Satan; <WH7854> even the LORD <WH3068> that hath chosen <WH977> Jerusalem <WH3389> rebuke <WH1605> thee: is not <WH3808> this <WH2088> a brand <WH181> plucked <WH5337> out of the fire? <WH4480> <WH784>
Now Joshua <WH3091> was <WH1961> clothed <WH3847> with filthy <WH6674> garments, <WH899> and stood <WH5975> before <WH6440> the angel. <WH4397>

And he answered <WH6030> and spoke <WH559> unto <WH413> those that stood <WH5975> before <WH6440> him, saying, <WH559> Take away <WH5493> the filthy <WH6674> garments <WH899> from <WH4480> <WH5921> him. And unto <WH413> him he said, <WH559> Behold, <WH7200> I have caused thine iniquity <WH5771> to pass <WH5674> from <WH4480> <WH5921> thee, and I will clothe <WH3847> thee with change of raiment. <WH4254>

And I said, <WH559> Let them set <WH7760> a fair <WH2889> miter <WH6797> upon <WH5921> his head. <WH7218> So they set <WH7760> a fair <WH2889> miter <WH6797> upon <WH5921> his head, <WH7218> and clothed <WH3847> him with garments. <WH899> And the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> stood by. <WH5975>
And the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> protested <WH5749> unto Joshua, <WH3091> saying, <WH559>

Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts; <WH6635> If <WH518> thou wilt walk <WH1980> in my ways, <WH1870> and if <WH518> thou wilt keep <WH8104> <WH853> my charge, <WH4931> then thou <WH859> shalt also <WH1571> judge <WH1777> <WH853> my house, <WH1004> and shalt also <WH1571> keep <WH8104> my <WH853> courts, <WH2691> and I will give <WH5414> thee places to walk <WH4108> among <WH996> these <WH428> that stand <WH5975> by.

Hear <WH8085> now, <WH4994> O Joshua <WH3091> the high <WH1419> priest, <WH3548> thou, <WH859> and thy fellows <WH7453> that sit <WH3427> before <WH6440> thee: for <WH3588> they <WH1992> are men <WH376> wondered <WH4159> at: for, <WH3588> behold, <WH2009> I will bring forth <WH935> <WH853> my servant <WH5650> the BRANCH. <WH6780>

For <WH3588> behold <WH2009> the stone <WH68> that <WH834> I have laid <WH5414> before <WH6440> Joshua; <WH3091> upon <WH5921> one <WH259> stone <WH68> shall be seven <WH7651> eyes: <WH5869> behold, <WH2009> I will engrave <WH6605> the graving <WH6603> thereof, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> and I will remove <WH4185> <WH853> the iniquity <WH5771> of that <WH1931> land <WH776> in one <WH259> day. <WH3117>

In that <WH1931> day, <WH3117> saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> shall ye call <WH7121> every man <WH376> his neighbor <WH7453> under <WH413> <WH8478> the vine <WH1612> and under <WH413> <WH8478> the fig tree. <WH8384>
